site_name: Battersea Power Station Phase 3b Kirtling Street SW8 5BN
description: This council has been asked for its observation on application submitted to Wandsworth Council (2020/0579) Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 for variations to Conditions 7 (Parameter Plans), 8 (Floorspace Areas), 10 (Distribution of Use Classes), 11 (Maximum Floorspace Areas), 13 (No. of Residential Units) and 61 (Approved Drawings) of the outline planning permission dated 8th November 2016 (ref: 2016/1119) for: "the restoration, extension, alterations and conversion of the Power Station building to provide retail, residential flats, business, cultural, hotel and conference facilities, event space and incidental accommodation; the demolition of other buildings and development of the land surrounding the Power Station and adjacent/nearby sites to provide retail, restaurants bars and cafes, offices, hotel, residential, community and cultural space, assembly and leisure space,serviced apartments, an energy centre and basement plant; parking for cars, coaches,motorcycles and bicycles; new access and internal road system and servicing; 'off-site' highway works; works to the jetty and riverwall to facilitate river transport and fuel delivery; provision of open space and landscaping." (The amendments consist of the relocation of 23,843sqm of office (Class B1) floorspace and  17sqm of retail (Class A1) floorspace from Phase 4 to Phase 3B; the relocation of 23,038sqm of residential (Class C3) floorspace and 4,180sqm of  community/leisure (Class D1/D2) from Phase 3B to Phase 4; remodelling of Development Zone O1 to create a standalone office (Class B1) building alongside an amended residential building within Phase 3B; rationalisation of basement levels within Phase 3B; and discharge of Conditions 22 (Car Park Management Strategy), 36 (Sustainable Waste Strategy), 38 (Construction Management Plan), 44 (Ecological Mitigation Measures), 46 (Flood Risk Assessment), 49 (Drainage Strategy) and 59 (Servicing Management Strategy) in respect of Phase 3B only).
